stages.logText:
After giving him the key of Luthor and talking with Umar about Andor, I needed to ask him about Thieves' Guild itself.
I want to join them to see what kind of jobs they do.
Umar told me to talk with Troublemaker regarding my first task for the Guild.

Troublemaker told me to bring him three journals from spies of the guild. First I have to talk with Leta in my village, then with Dunla in Vilegard's tavern, and finally with Fanamor somewhere around Crossroads guardhouse.
I have to remember to tell them the password "You are no one. No one knows you. No one has seen you."
Leta gave me her journal and advised me to not raise suspicion.
I got Dunla's journal without any problem. I have set out to get the last journal.
Fanamor has been gravely wounded, and the Feygard Scout grabbed the journal.
After I had killed the Feygard scout I talked again with Fanamor. She's losing blood quickly, so I have to bring her a bandage. I need to find a trustworthy priest.
Thoronir gave me a bandage. I have to return to Fanamor as soon as possible.
Unfortunately, I was not able to save Fanamor's life. However, I did get her journal.
Fanamor is alive and will find her own way to return.
I returned to Troublemaker and gave him the journals. He told me to talk with Umar, maybe he has another task for me.
